About the Company: Prima Plastics Ltd is one of the leading exporters of plastic moulded furniture from India. The company entered in aluminium composite panel (ACP) market and from then it is making efforts to cater the real estate market and in process established as brand Aluma.The product range of the company includes Chairs,Stool,Baby Chairs,Dining tables,Teapoys,Trolley,Others such as planters, shoe rack, fridge stand and baby rocker.
